room_title: Escape room "The Lost Tomb of Monthu" by America's Escape Game in Miami
room_description:
Jeffery Lowsley, a renowned Egyptologist, has gone missing after traveling to Egypt some weeks ago. The professor believed that an ancient ruby lies somewhere in the tomb with the power to unlock the historical relations between ancient Egypt and this lost civilization.
Unlock your inner explorer as you navigate the mysterious tomb. Be warned, tombs are always cryptic and filled with mystery â€“ you will need to be shrewd, focused and open to all possibilities.
